app_type: Apply for a prison job or job change

app_details: I work in the kitchen from 9 to 3 and on the 20th June I got my normal pay but the week after that I got less than my normal pay. Then I got my normal pay again the week after that. Why is it

I don't want my trainers anymore. They are too small. I ordered a size 12 but they are more like a size 9 or 10. Why do they do that? I want my money back and I don't want to keep them anymore. I waited 2 months for them to even get here. I want to use my money for something else now. I don't want to have to pay for postage either cos it's their fault.

I've got a court hearing next Tuesday at 11 in the morning but my brother is on a visit to me on that day as well. I think it's in the afternoon but I don't know. Maybe 2 or 3 o clock. Can he still come?
